FuncDef: This command assigns an existing CPU protection policy to the associated service. The CPU protection policies are configured in theconfig>sys>security>cpu-protection>policycpu-protection-policy-idcontext.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies an existing CPU protection policy. Values-1 to 255.
This keyword enables Ethernet Connectivity Fault Management monitoring.
This keyword applies the rate limit to the sum of the per peer packet rates.
(Committed Access Rate) This keyword causes Eth-CFM packets to be ignored when enforcing the overall-rate.

ExtraInfo: Default: cpu-protection 254 (for access interfaces)cpu-protection 255 (for network interfaces)The configuration of no cpu-protection returns the interface/SAP to the default policies.If no CPU protection policy is assigned to a service SAP then a the default policy is used to limit the overall-rate.
